      • RegisterForCourseFrame

        public RegisterForCourseFrame()

      • RegisterForCourseFrame

        public RegisterForCourseFrame​(java.io.PrintWriter socketOut,
                              java.net.Socket aSocket,
                              java.io.BufferedReader stdIn,
                              java.io.BufferedReader socketIn,
                              java.io.ObjectInputStream objectIn,
                              Student student)
        Constructor for class RegisterForFrame, which initializes server communication variables from the MenuFrame (although it is called by its controller
        Parameters:
        socketOut - is the printWriter to be used as a socketOut
        aSocket - is the Socket to be used as aSocket
        stdIn - is the BufferedReader to be used as stdIn
        socketIn - is the BufferedReader to be used as a socketIn
        objectIn - is the objectInputStream used to read in objects to the frame
        student - is the student to who the course is being for

      • getCourseNum

        public javax.swing.JTextField getCourseNum()

      • displayFrame

        public void displayFrame()
        displayFrame() is the method that creates and displays the RegisteForCourseframe for the user, who can then input various parameters to determine which course to register for. The action of inputs and buttons are controlled/called by a RegisterForCourseController, which is instantiated at the end of the method
        Overrides:
        displayFrame in class MenuFrame
